thumb.title: Rainy knight - Andromeda (RJ2W) Official Music Video
thumb.description: Instagram : Rainyknight_officialThe Andromeda Galaxy, located 2.5 million light-years away from the Milky Way, has experienced ecological imbalance due to excessive pursuit of advanced technology. This has led to conflicts among the Andromedans as they vie for resources, spreading to different planets. Now, their resource competition extends to other galaxies, including Rainy Knights' Mother Star, RJ2W.
